headline: Piper Sandler Turns Less Bearish on Workday (WDAY) Following Workday Rising
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the Must-Watch AI Stocks on Wall Street. On September 17, Piper Sandler upgraded the stock to “Neutral” from Underweight and raised its price target to $235.00 from $220.00. The rating upgrade follows key announcements made at the company’s annual event, Workday Rising. Analysts led by Brent Bracelin said that they […]

headline: Automaker giant Stellantis says customers’ personal data stolen during breach
summary: One report says, citing the hackers who took credit for the breach, that 18 million customer records were stolen from Stellantis' customer database.

raw.headline: Automaker giant Stellantis says customers’ personal data stolen during breach

headline: Vigience Announces SAP-integrated Vigience Field Service on Salesforce AppExchange
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 22, 2025--Vigience launches SAP-integrated Field Service app on Salesforce AppExchange, connecting SAP S/4HANA with Salesforce Field Service.

headline: DealHub Collaborates with Crowe to Enhance Quote-to-Revenue Operations for Modern GTM Strategies
summary: DealHub.io, provider of the leading AI-powered CPQ, today announced a collaboration with Crowe LLP, a leading public accounting and consulting firm. The newly announced relationship aims to deliver streamlined and scalable Quote-to-Revenue operations for Salesforce CRM customers.
